channel.title: Lost Legend Weapons
channel.description:
Decided to work on a weapon set with each weapon containing a different unique look than the others. I will not be posting wireframes due to the time it would take me and lets face it ;D ima tad lazy but i did incorporate angles along with the fitted model [URL=http://s879.photobucket.com/user/Kirikugi_2009/media/Venulisside.png.html][IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/Venulisside.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s879.photobucket.com/user/Kirikugi_2009/media/Venulisfitted.png.html][IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/Venulisfitted.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s879.photobucket.com/user/Kirikugi_2009/media/Venulisangle.png.html][IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/Venulisangle.png[/img][/URL] Venulis

item.title: Lost Legend Weapons
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:8, topic:518816”]Shinrune looks a bit flaccid, should be more erect.[/quote] xD yea i forgot to rotate when i took the renderations so it looks “flaccid” and xD i dont do many scythes so that was experimental but the rest ive did many of the genre.

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legend Weapons
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:5, topic:518816”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=637084.msg4295483#msg4295483 date=1368135675]
They are really nice concepts, but i can’t help but think a few of them are poly over kills. The uniqueness of the models is refreshing, keep it up.

I’ve noticed on quite a few models that you don’t have much gradient going on with the lighter colours, gradient should be a part of all colours added to the model.
[/quote]

i agree with amy, also you should post a few wireframes, and im guessing you dont plan to add into a rsps right? seem a bit to futuristic but not my choice lol just my opinion good job though!!![/quote]
The poly is just fine. a little much in some places but not overkill by no means. Its actuly very very low compared to the amount of detail i put on stuff i regularly do and well the stuff i post i want to be rsps but development never goes that far. But realistically i just made these for the community to look at and give me feedback. that’s how i get better. But no wireframes will be given because my wireframes are clean cut. What you see is what you get.

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legend Weapons
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:4, topic:518816”]They are really nice concepts, but i can’t help but think a few of them are poly over kills. The uniqueness of the models is refreshing, keep it up.

I’ve noticed on quite a few models that you don’t have much gradient going on with the lighter colours, gradient should be a part of all colours added to the model. :)[/quote]

i agree with amy, also you should post a few wireframes, and im guessing you dont plan to add into a rsps right? seem a bit to futuristic but not my choice lol just my opinion good job though!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legend Weapons

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

They are really nice concepts, but i can’t help but think a few of them are poly over kills. The uniqueness of the models is refreshing, keep it up.

I’ve noticed on quite a few models that you don’t have much gradient going on with the lighter colours, gradient should be a part of all colours added to the model.
